newsitem.title: USA: Blue-chips end lower, broader market mixed.
newsitem.headline: Blue-chips end lower, broader market mixed.

text.p: Blue-chip stocks fell Monday on fears of stronger inflation, but the broader market ended mixed.

Based on early, unofficial results, the Dow Jones industrial average lost 41.63 points to close at 7,289.41. But in the broader market, advancing issues led declines by a 3-2 margin on moderately active volume of about 435 million shares on the New York Stock Exchange. The Nasdaq composite index added 4.45 points to 1,404.77.
